cards.markdown: *One Man & His Blog* is the personal weblog of [Adam Tinworth](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adam_Tinworth "Adam Tinworth"). I’ve been using it to explore the intersection of digital technology, publishing and journalism for well over 18 years – and it’s where I continue to think out loud as part of my consultancy work. ## About Me I’ve been a journalist for 25 years and a blogger for nearly two decades. Since 2006 I’ve been working-full time in digital journalism and publishing development, and I have extensive experience of change management, workflows, and technology implementation. I also deliver training of journalists, publishers and other content-centric people from students up to senior management level. Since 2012, I’ve been working independently as a consultant on: - publishing strategy - digital journalism - mobile - social media. My clients have ranged from international magazine publishers, to national newspapers like the *Financial Times* and *The Telegraph*, to small businesses. I’m more interested in the challenge of the work than the size of the client. I’m also a visiting lecturer at City, University of London where I teach digital journalism and [audience engagement skills](https://www.city.ac.uk/prospective-students/courses/postgraduate/interactive-journalism) to Masters students, including video strategy, social media, community management, SEO and audience strategy. You can see more about my [career to date on LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/adamtinworth). If you think I might be able to help you, please [drop me a line](mailto:adam@onemanandhisblog.com) and we can discuss working together.
